Source: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Finsch_diamond_mine. The Finsch mine is located approximately 165 km west of Kimberley in the Northern Cape province of South Africa. Web search geocoded. Source: https://www.mining-technology.com/projects/finsch/. Finsch diamond mine is one of the world's most important diamond mines and South Africa's second largest diamond operation by production

web_search_companies.notes: Petra Diamonds holds a 74% interest in Finsch Diamond Mine (Pty) Ltd, with the remaining 26% split between the Employee Trust and Kago Diamonds.
